title: Andhra family stranded as car taken away for CM's convoy - Deccan Herald
content:
1. Andhra family stranded as car taken away for CM's convoy  Deccan Herald
  2. 2 Andhra Officials Suspended For Forcibly Taking Cab, Evicting Passengers  NDTV
  3. Andhra family left stranded after officials take their cab for CM’s convoy  The News Minute
  4. YS Jagan furious over Ongole incident, two RTO officers suspended  The Hans India
  5. Devotees stranded as officials take away private SUV for Andhra Pradesh CM Jagan Mohan Reddy's visit  The Hindu
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A family of six, including two children, on their way to Tirupati for darshan were left stranded on a road in Ongole on Wednesday night, when the RTA officials took away the car they were traveling in, along with the driver. The officials told them that the vehicle was needed for convoy arrangements for Chief Minister Jaganmohan Reddy's tour in the district on Friday. Vemula Srinivas and his family were travelling from their hometown Vinukonda to Tirupati in a white Innova which the officials spotted as suitable for the cavalcade.
